tool_description: Analyzes current inventory levels, turnover rates, and stock movement patterns to inform inventory-based pricing strategies.

warehouse_locations.description: List of warehouse or location identifiers to analyze

analysis_period_days.description: Number of days to analyze for turnover calculations

category_filter.description: Product category to focus analysis on

error_messages: Invalid warehouse locations: One or more warehouse identifiers are not recognized.
Insufficient inventory data: Not enough inventory movement data for the specified analysis period.
Analysis period too short: analysis_period_days must be at least 7 days.
Category not found: The specified category_filter does not exist in the product catalog.
usage: Specify warehouse_locations to analyze inventory levels and turnover. Optionally filter by category and set analysis period for turnover calculations.

analysis_timestamp.description: When the inventory analysis was performed

total_inventory_value.description: Total value of inventory across analyzed locations

slow_moving_products.description: Products with low turnover rates requiring attention
